Marketing Solutions

  • Lead Generation

    We help engage new clients with top quality traffic: native ads, push notifications, banner ads, email and targeted search to boost conversions on clients' landing pages, custom funnels and websites

  • Full design studio services

    Whether you need a website, funnel, LP, mailer or a banner, our design team is dedicated to high quality visual and user-friendly design

  • Media Buying

    We specialize in media planning and buying in all markets, including targeted traffic, traffic from big publishers, small websites, niche sites and networks. Display and mobile on CPM, CPC

  • Affiliate Marketing

    Filancy has an extensive expertise in building partner programs for the clients in various fields like forex, crypto, gadgets, nutra, gambling, games and others. Driving conversions to partners on CPL, CPA, CPI

  • Content management

    Our content marketing services include content strategy creation, blogging, copywriting, translation services, SMM, videos, animation, infographics and much more

  • Campaign Optimization and Consulting

    We know how to improve your sales results by optimizing your advertising campaigns. Real Time data and analytics will follow a data driven approach to best ROI
